pages.seoTitle: Modern Shop - Premium Products for Modern Living
pages.seoDesc: Discover our curated collection of premium products. Free shipping on orders over $100.

pages.title: About Us
pages.excerpt: Learn about our story and commitment to quality.

data.text: Our Story
Founded in 2018, Modern Shop began with a simple mission: to curate the finest products from around the world and make them accessible to everyone who appreciates quality and design.
We believe that everyday objects should be functional, beautiful, and built to last. That's why we personally test every product in our collection before adding it to our store.
Our Values
Our Promise
Every product comes with our quality guarantee and 30-day return policy. We're committed to your satisfaction.

pages.seoDesc: Learn about Modern Shop's mission and commitment to quality products.

pages.title: Contact
pages.excerpt: Get in touch with our customer support team.

data.text: Contact Us
Have a question about an order? Need help choosing the right product? We're here to help.

pages.seoDesc: Get in touch with our customer support team for any questions.

pages.title: FAQ

data.text: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: How long does shipping take?
items.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping (1-2 days) is available.

items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be in original condition.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Yes! We ship to over 50 countries worldwide.

items.question: How can I track my order?
items.answer: You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships.

items.question: Are your products authentic?
items.answer: Absolutely. All products come with authenticity guarantee.

pages.seoDesc: Find answers to common questions about shipping, returns, and our products.

pages.title: Shipping & Returns
pages.excerpt: Information about our shipping and return policies.

data.text: Shipping & Returns
Shipping
We offer free shipping on all orders over $100. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping is available for an additional fee.
Returns
Not satisfied? Return any item within 30 days for a full refund. Items must be in original condition with tags attached.

pages.seoDesc: Free shipping on orders over $100. Easy 30-day returns.
